response.original_title: 会社飲みで終電逃してオンナ上司の家にお泊りしたら早漏なのがバレて金曜の夜から月曜の朝まで強●射精させられたボク 広瀬りおな
response.overview: I wanted a boss like this! When I Missed The Last Train At A Drinking Party And Stayed At Manager Sumire's House, I Ended Up Being A Fucking Slut! "Massage your boobs" Sumire who was drunk and lustful ordered me to have sex, but ... it was more erotic than I imagined, and it immediately exploded. If premature ejaculation is found out, she is further played with and tested how many times she can ejaculate! The section chief's tech is too harsh and it's a real awakening! Even if I put it out, I got a erection again and continued to make juice from Friday night until before I went to work on Monday!
response.title: Ending Up At Female Boss’ Home After Staying Late At A Work Party And Missing The Train. I Ejaculated Too Early When I Spent The Night, So Now She’s Giving Me Ejaculation Control From Friday Night Till Monday Morning. Riona Hirose
